docs.text: Introduction // A new extension function server.pluginManager.registerSuspendingEvents(PlayerConnectListener(), plugin) @EventHandler suspend fun onPlayerJoinEvent(playerJoinEvent: PlayerJoinEvent) { val player = event.player // Long running operation to database is automatically suspended and continued. val userData = database.getUserDataFromPlayer(player) // Userdata was loaded asynchronous from the database and is now ready. println(userData.killCount) }
docs.title: Home
